Nikolai Abilov infuses his work with a unique sense of culture and context, layered through unconventional schedules and Kaleidoscope eyes. This unique approach, coupled with his inherent understanding of the substance of tales, and ability to amplify the voices of marginalized creators, makes his work on African American narratives distinctive and valuable.

Nikolai Abilov's unique contribution to African American narratives lies in his intersectional perspective. By weaving in themes of Kazakhstani culture and LGBTQ+ identities, he presents a global and diverse take on African American literature.
